p: All the selected EO showed potential larvicidal activity with LC50 for 24 h lies between 0.42 to 163.65 ppm against Aedes aegypti. The highest larvicidal activity was recorded for the EO of Mentha piperita (Mp)having LC50 value of 0.42 ppm at 24 h followed by Allium sativum(As) having LC50 value of 16.19 ppm at 24 h (Table 1).
